title: Ticket #324: Race condition in condor_config when two or more running
description: Occasionally, the test suite will die in remote_pre while running condor configure with the error "Unable to open file in /tmp directory!" in the error output file. condor_configure is trying to open a file named /tmp/set_config_value.temp. My guess is that two are running at once, and stepping on each other. Sticking the pid at the end of this filename should do the trick.
